abstract: Another private equity firm has snapped up a high-profile former chief executive. The Carlyle Group announced that it had hired Wyeth’s former chief, Robert Essner, as a senior adviser to its Global Healthcare group, Reuters reported.
snippet: Another private equity firm has snapped up a high-profile former chief executive. The Carlyle Group announced that it had hired Wyeth’s former chief, Robert Essner, as a senior adviser to its Global Healthcare group, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Another private equity firm has snapped up a high-profile former chief executive. The Carlyle Group announced that it had hired Wyeth‘s former chief, Robert Essner, as a senior adviser to its Global Healthcare group, Reuters reported.
